content: ***please note this pattern is available for free on my website or you may purchase the ad-free pdf here on ravelry *** **materials** less than 1 skein of bernat super value 5 5 mm/i hook tapestry needle scissors **size and guage** guage 7 stitches by 5 row in pattern = approx 2 in square finished hat measures 8 in tall x 9 in wide laying flat **abbreviations** us terminology half_double_crochet half_double_crochet chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch flo front loop only blo back loop only
